title: Fall Movie Preview and Love for ‘Better Call Saul’ | The Watch (Ep. 293)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan is joined by Sean Fennessey to talk about movies to pay attention to as awards season begins, including ‘A Star Is Born’ (1:13) and ‘Green Book’ (16:14). Then Chris speaks with Miles Surrey about everything that has happened so far in Season 4 of 'Better Call Saul' (20:31).
Read Miles Surrey’s recap of ‘Better Call Saul’ S4E8 here.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
